snippet: Meeting with Secretary of State John Kerry, a group of Chinese bloggers appealed to the United States to take up the cause of Internet freedom.
abstract: Group of Chinese bloggers appeals to Sec of State John Kerry to push for Internet freedom in their country; say the ability of Chinese citizens to gain access to information was under siege and the country's prospects for becoming a democracy were uncertain at best.
lead_paragraph: Meeting with Secretary of State John Kerry, a group of Chinese bloggers appealed to the United States to take up the cause of Internet freedom.

headline.main: Chinese Ask Kerry to Help Tear Down a Firewall
headline.print_headline: Chinese Ask Kerry to Help Tear Down a Firewall
